>     Shaking his head he moved back some more than ran at the hatch
flinging
> himself feet first at it, both feet connecting hard breaking the hatch
from
> it's weakened surroundings. Peeking his head out he looked down the face
of
> the outside base and dug his claws in slowly scaling downwards towards the
> ground far below. This was always a pain of infiltrating and causing
> havoc...there was rarely a ground floor exit waiting for him...
>

{Panthos}

    Panthos continued scaling down the side of the Catz base, hardly
suprised there didn't seem to be even an alarm sounded yet much less any
kind of response. Smiling he continued on down the ground almost within
leaping range as his metallic claws dug into the plating of the ships hull,
his eyes cautious and always watching, it wouldn't do for a turret to spring
out and start firing and be caught unawares.

    Only a few more feet then he could transform and head north, from his
internal scanners he watched the cluster of signatures around this place and
noted more active signals back at the ruins of the Maximal City. First down,
he chided himself, then switch codes and go meet your maximal "brothers".
The feral grin returned to his face plate and he couldn't suppress the
chuckle. Hopefully they'd prove a bit more difficult than this base...
